name: Minima17: Super(s)hot
description:
Summary:

Time doesn't move when you don't. Well, maybe a little.

A vertical shooter where you manipulate time to skilfully take out enemies.

Minima?

Minima is my series of games that focus on a single game mechanic. Due to time constraints the presentation of these games is fairly ... minimal.

This is my 17th Minima game ("bitesize nuggets of gaming fun!") and my March entry for #1GAM.

If you enjoyed this then why not go to my website for more gaming snacks made for my own amusement. Thanks.
